'''Judar''' is a quest-exclusive NPC that appears in the [[Archon Quest]], [[Chapter III]]: Act IV - [[King Deshret and the Three Magi]].

==Profile==
Judar was sent by the [[Akademiya]] to kidnap the Village Keepers. [[Rahman]] later turns Judar in to be punished by [[Dehya]], [[Alhaitham]], [[Cyno]], and others. When Judar sees Cyno, Judar cowers in fear, afraid of being torn into pieces.<ref>{{Ref/Quest|Secret of the Scorching Desert}}</ref>
